main.name: Tonio Hiraki
main.description: Seeing how my work can bring so much value to my clients is what drives my work ethic. I always love helping people create a digital space that provides value.
main.bio: For the last eight years, I've been working in the IT world as a team leader and developer in multiple languages and environments. My goal is always to understand your needs and objectives and to carefully consider what solution will work best for you and your customers. I can quickly help startups and enterprises with prototypes and ideas by efficiently building those things into reality. My expertise lies in building the Websites, Hybrid apps, Dapp, Defi with elegant UI/UX, modern front-end frameworks, scalable microservices, infrastructure modeling, smart contracts, cryptocurrency and AWS. With all that said, reach out and we can start crafting the website/web application/mobile application you have always dreamed of!
main.contactmessage: Reach out by inviting me to your project. I look forward to it!

work.title: Full-Stack Engineer (Website & Smart contracts)
work.description: React.js, Ethers.js, Web3modal, Solidity, Erc20 token, Tokenomics, Smart contract, Binance Smart Chain

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Develop UIs with JavaScript(React.js), HTML and CSS, Material UI. Created RESTful APIs for increased scalability of the application. Integrate Stripe payment gateway, social APIs

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: Building frontend with Vue.js, Vuetify, Material Design Specification, Perfect Mobile. Responsive, HTML5, SAPP. Google Firebase (Authentication, Firestore, Realtime database, Functions, Storage), Stripe. AWS, Godaddy DNS, Nginx

work.title: Full-Stack Engineer
work.description: Server-side rendering with Next.js, frontend with Reactjs, TailwindCSS, Material UI. Android/iOS app with React Native. Integrate API with GraphQL, backend with Django. Integrate Wallet, Wax Blockchain, Crypto.

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: Building the frontend with Angular.js 1.3.0. Building the mobile applications with Ionic. Introduced wireframing and information architecture concepts to increase team productivity.

projects.title: Bellevue

testimonials.text: Tonio and the team of developers working on my project were AMAZING. Communication was always immediate and they understood the tasks. The development they did (Creating a custom website platform: front and back end) was excellent. They also created a Smart Contract and synced the Blockchain with my website to integrate transactions. They are very patient and attended to my requests immediately. This team is definitely a great one. After working with them for months, I highly recommend them.

He is probably the best web developer. His reviews speak for themselves, and I'm here to just add another one. He is experienced, takes a holistic approach, and is an invaluable asset to me and many others who have brought him on as a developer for their projects. If you need a developer for your web project, look no further.
Amazing work, we will continue working together and definitely recommended for everything blockchain and smart contract related!

Tonio went way beyond what i expected of him,came up with a novel approach that i never consider.he's hard working and delivered a complicated project way faster than I thought he would.i will definitely work with him again in the future as programmer with his work ethic and talent are extremely rare.
